post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Based on Mr. Park's thought about Transcript from above,
I think Transcript might have 1:1 relationship with CourseHistory of a student. I will modify the UML accordinly for further discussion.

>Please educate me:
>- Describe what "Transcript" is.
>- How is it associated with other data tables (assuming it is)?
>- Can a student have many "Transcript"s?
post.title: [re] Define Transcript
